content: @Sean McIlvenna I'm wondering whether there is an option in Trifolia to use a custom menu.xml (we are using a custom IG template) or whether there is any configuration option to control the menu creation other than the order of the pages. I'm particularly interested in removing the default menu items: "Table of Contents" and "Artifact Index"
Hi @Igor Sirkovich No, unfortunately that isn't an option right now. But, certainly one we could consider. I'll put it on our backlog and see what we can come up with.
Thank you @Sean McIlvenna! This would be a super useful (and much needed) feature.
Hi @Igor Sirkovich , we have plans to implement this functionality in our current sprint. Hopefully this will be done within the next week, and available the DEV environment to play around with.
You can follow this ticket for updates: https://trifolia.atlassian.net/browse/TRIFFHIR-501
